description: Claire Adams, Jade Indica and Sarah Jane Ceylon all take a long turn suffering and begging on their knees in this edited live show from May. The girls are clamped by their necks to a waist high horizontal metal bar that gives them no choice but to shift all their weight to their knees and place them on an (in?)conveniently placed board covered in hard uncooked rice. There they squirm in a row, with no relief. Shifting their bodies around only makes the pain worse, and trying to move makes them choke on their restraints. Not satisfied with their ordeal yet, cyd puts the girls through more torment, including an elaborate, double girl excruciating clothespin zipper.
title: Three Models Suffer on Their Knees Live, Part 1
